docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo revealed the details of a 10-part initiative that could cement his reputation as a defender of women’s equality.

headline.seo: Cuomo Women’s Rights Plan May Hinge on Abortion Proposal
headline.main: Cuomo Women’s Rights Plan May Hinge on Abortion Proposal
headline.print_headline: Women’s Rights Plan May Hinge on Abortion Proposal

docs.abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo unveils his long-promised Women’s Equality Act, 10-point plan that could reclaim state's progressive mantle and cement his reputation as a defender of women's rights; plan's controversial element would guarantee woman's right to an abortion as established by 1973 Supreme Court decision Roe v Wade.
docs.snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo revealed the details of a 10-part initiative that could cement his reputation as a defender of women’s equality.

docs.lead_paragraph: The case of a sick woman in El Salvador who had been denied an abortion has convulsed the region, which is known for having some of the world’s most stringent abortion laws.

headline.seo: Woman Who Sought Abortion in El Salvador Delivers Baby
headline.main: A High-Risk Pregnancy Is Terminated. But Was It an Abortion?
headline.print_headline: A High-Risk Pregnancy Is Terminated. But Was It an Abortion?

docs.abstract: Memo from Latin America; Caesarean section that ended high-risk pregnancy of El Salvadoran woman known as Beatriz raises question of whether doctors who performed operation managed to terminate pregnancy without violating country's strict anti-abortion law; Beatriz had been denied an abortion by country's courts; law, while stringent, is also vague and open to interpretation.
docs.snippet: The case of a sick woman in El Salvador who had been denied an abortion has convulsed the region, which is known for having some of the world’s most stringent abortion laws.

docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Crane, a deportation officer who leads the union of immigration enforcement agents, has made it his mission to stop a bipartisan bill to overhaul the immigration system.

headline.seo: For Chris Crane, a Quest to Block an Immigration Bill
headline.main: Single-Minded Mission to Block an Immigration Bill
headline.print_headline: For Deportation Officer, a Single-Minded Mission to Block an Immigration Bill

docs.abstract: Federal deportation officer Chris Crane is making it his mission to stop bipartisan bill to overhaul immigration system; Crane, who heads union of immigration enforcement agents, has testified about bill in House Judiciary Committee, securing his record as most frequent witness on Capital Hill during immigration debate.
docs.snippet: Chris Crane, a deportation officer who leads the union of immigration enforcement agents, has made it his mission to stop a bipartisan bill to overhaul the immigration system.

docs.lead_paragraph: On Monday night, ABC Family bids farewell to the trials and tribulations of adolescent pregnancy with the finale of “The Secret Life of the American Teenager.”
docs.snippet: On Monday night, ABC Family bids farewell to the trials and tribulations of adolescent pregnancy with the finale of “The Secret Life of the American Teenager.”

docs.lead_paragraph: Hypothetically, donating sperm so friends can have a baby is a simple decision.

headline.seo: The Complexity in a Sperm Donation - Modern Love
headline.main: A Choice Not as Easy as It Looked
headline.print_headline: A Choice Not as Easy as It Looked

docs.abstract: Lisa Schlesinger Modern Love column shares the complexity involved in sperm donation.
docs.snippet: Hypothetically, donating sperm so friends can have a baby is a simple decision.
